Class HeaterUserConnector

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater.connections.HeaterUserConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, HeaterUserAndControlI, HeaterUserAndExternalControlI, HeaterUserCI, HeaterUserImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, Remote
public class HeaterUserConnector extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector implements HeaterUserCI
The class HeaterConnector implements a connector for the HeaterCI component interface.
